Text:
why in this and other torrent when i install, there is no subtitle line --- save as in subtitle editor ?

HElp, is there any good version out with this feature that works ?

Instead of the "save" button I had on my former version, on the lower right of the subtitles window, it appears only "Add a new subtitle line". The "save" button is gone and I can't find it nowhere! Is this a bug?
does not playback properly on Windows 7

The reason why I didn't post release...
"BS.Player.Pro.v2.51.1022.Multilingual.Incl.Keymaker-CORE" was this:

guys i have a problem with this in windows 7 when i install it and put the cd-key everything works gr8 but when i open a movie it shows that i need to put the key and it going on and on all the time help!?!?
You should do what I do with keygens. Run them only in a VMWARE machine then restore it to a clean state. I never have problems that way. lol
